thread.title: Marc
thread.title_full: Defender Bird Spikes reviewed by Marc

author: Marc
title: Marc
text: I have now ordered and installed three lots of Defender Bird Spikes - a neighbour insists on feeding pigeons - about 20 birds swoop down every morning and evening. They now rest on her roof! The glue is particularly easy to use, both on roof tiles and on wooden fencing. I used plastic spikes on the roof and steel ones on fencing. They might also discourage the grey squirrels.
